entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
